org.apache.hadoop.hive.hbase

Interface HBaseKeyFactory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    HiveStoragePredicateHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractHBaseKeyFactory, CompositeHBaseKeyFactory, DefaultHBaseKeyFactory

    public interface HBaseKeyFactory
extends HiveStoragePredicateHandler
    Provides custom implementation of object and object inspector for hbase key. The key object should implement LazyObjectBase. User can optionally implement HiveStoragePredicateHandler for handling filter predicates

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.metadata.HiveStoragePredicateHandler

        HiveStoragePredicateHandler.DecomposedPredicate
